CHSC5816 - I2C Touch Driver (Apollo510)
devices

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides a hardware abstraction layer for the CHSC581 capacitive touch sensor device on Apollo5 platforms. It enables initialization, configuration, event detection, and power management for reliable touch input in embedded applications. The driver supports multi-channel touch detection, customizable sensitivity, interrupt/event handling, and integration with system power modes for optimal user interface performance.

Key Features

  1. Multi-channel Touch: Detects multiple touch points.
  2. Event Handling: Supports touch, release, and gesture events.
  3. Sensitivity Configuration: Adjustable touch thresholds.
  4. Power Efficiency: Low-power operation and sleep mode support.
  5. Interrupt Support: Fast event notification via hardware interrupts.

Functionality

  • Initialize CHSC581 device
  • Configure touch channels and sensitivity
  • Detect and process touch events
  • Manage power and sleep modes
  • Support for event callbacks and interrupt handling

Usage

  1. Initialize device with am_devices_chsc581_ap5_init()
  2. Configure channels and sensitivity as needed
  3. Use am_devices_chsc581_ap5_poll() or interrupt handler for event detection
  4. Process touch/release/gesture events via provided APIs

Configuration

  • Set up channel mapping and sensitivity thresholds
  • Configure interrupt/event callbacks
  • Integrate with system power management

◆ am_devices_chsc5816_init()

uint32_t am_devices_chsc5816_init ( uint32_t ui32Module,
am_devices_iom_chsc5816_config_t * pDevConfig,
void ** ppDevHandle,
void ** ppIomHandle,
uint32_t ui32IntPin,
uint32_t ui32RstPin,
am_hal_gpio_handler_t touch_handler,
void * pArg )

Init the Device Driver and IOM for the CHSC5816 Touch Sensor.

Parameters
ui32Module- IOM Module Number.
pDevConfig- Touch device config.
ppDevHandle- Device handle which needs to be return.
ppIomHandle- IOM handle which needs to be return.
ui32IntPin- Touch interrupt pin num.
ui32RstPin- Touch reset pin num
touch_handler- Touch interrupt handler.
pArg- The parameter of touch handler.
Returns
status - generic or interface specific status.

void * pCallbackCtxt )

Parameters
pDevHandle- Device handle.
touch_info- Pointer to the all touch information.
pfnCallback- Get complete callback function.
pCallbackCtxt- The param of callback function.
Returns
